title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.11 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1550.11 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) No fee shall be
charged for inspection of records, search for records or certification of the
records. (b) A fee, not exceeding 25
cents per page, for photocopies, not exceeding 9 by 14 inches, of records shall
be imposed by the fund. (c) A fee
for photocopies, exceeding 9 by 14 inches, of records shall be imposed by the
fund; the exact amount of such fee shall be determined by the records access
officer based on his analysis of the cost to the fund of photocopying such
records, except when a different fee may be otherwise prescribed by
law. (d) Notwithstanding the
provisions of subdivisions (b) and (c) of this section, the general manager or
his duly designated representative may, in his discretion, provide copies of
records without charging a fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1550.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
